arts.ttl: Bayer Leverkusen vs. PSV Eindhoven: UEFA Champions League LIVE blog and team news
arts.sum: Grimaldo's goal in the 2-2 draw in Copenhagen was his third for Leverkusen in the Champions League - his first came against Dutch opposition in a 4-0 win at Feyenoord last season. Having drawn their opening UEFA Champions League fixture against Copenhagen, Bayer Leverkusen are out to get all three points when they host PSV Eindhoven on Wednesday night (kick-off 9pm CEST).

arts.ttl: PSV hoping to get Champions League campaign going against stuttering Bayer Leverkusen
arts.sum: PSV will be in Germany on Wednesday night hoping to put their opening day Champions League defeat to Union St Gilloise behind them. They will be in the industrial regionâ€¦
